pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, January 11, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, January 11, 2018:

London, Ontario

9 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

London Convention Centre
300 York Street

Note for media:

  • On-site coverage of the Cabinet Retreat open to accredited media only. If you have not obtained accreditation in advance, please present yourself to the accreditation desk located outside Salon J of the Convention Centre as of 8 a.m. Thursday, January 11.

7 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Alumni Hall
Western University
Lambton Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media must register at the John P. Metras Sports Museum, located in Alumni Hall, no later than 6 p.m.

Media appearances

  • 8:10 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on London Morning, CBC Radio One.
  • 8:10 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on The Morning Show with Ken & Lisa, Newstalk 1290 CJBK.
